definition: to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
to predominate/to occupy a dominant position
to occupy by force/to seize/to dominate
to take the lead/to gain the upper hand

to come first in triennial palace examinations (idiom, refers to the carved stone turtle head in front of the imperial palace, next to which the most successful candidate in the imperial examinations was entitled to stand)/to be the champion/to be the very best in any field
advantageous/favorable/to benefit at others' expense/to take unfair advantage

sentences.english: Agriculture consists largely of subsistence farming and animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 在農業中佔很大部分的是種植業和畜牧業。

sentences.english: It is often combined with elements of numerology .
sentences.chinese: 通常，風水還與佔數學的原理結合起來使用。

sentences.english: Moreover, the relatively high proportion of mature or over-mature forests shows that resources in support are insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 近成過熟林所佔比例較大，後備資源不足。

sentences.english: Europe and Russia accounted for bulk of tobacco exports in the current year.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲和俄羅斯佔本年度菸草出口的大部分。

sentences.english: Plain of two-thirds of the total.
sentences.chinese: 平原佔總面積的三分之二。

sentences.english: The Western victors, however, have secured no such advantages.
sentences.chinese: 然而西方的勝利者卻無此優勢可佔。

sentences.english: Since the bosses can't do without profit workers have an dege.
sentences.chinese: 由於老闆不能沒有利潤，工人們就佔了上風。

sentences.english: National-wide, females claim 38% of the total number of cadres.
sentences.chinese: 全國女幹部的比例已佔幹部總數的38%以上。

sentences.english: Antibiotic use is half of the drug-resistance equation, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，抗生素的應用佔耐藥性原因的一半。

sentences.english: But I saved it. I put my basket on top.
sentences.chinese: 但是我佔位置了，我放潦攀籃子在上面。

sentences.english: Also the limited-time offers, which make you feel like you have to take advantage of a special deal.
sentences.chinese: 也要當心限時優惠，這會讓你感到佔了便宜。

sentences.english: Plateaus and mountains make up 60 per cent of China's total area.
sentences.chinese: 高原和山地佔中國總面積的百分之六十。

sentences.english: What is the percentage of scouts to the total members of the four uniform teams?
sentences.chinese: 童軍的人數佔這四個制服團體總人數的幾分之幾？

sentences.english: Investment and net exports generated close to three-quarters of China's incremental demand in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，投資和淨出口佔中國需求增量的近四分之三。

sentences.english: This is smaller than the share of the UK in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 這比起在全球經濟中英聯邦所佔的份額來還要少一些。

definition: on the up/currently winning/rising (in popularity etc)
participant in a survey/an interviewee/those questioned
clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role
